known_issues: Logo is not appearing on the website (possible missing/broken asset or incorrect reference).
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Normalize uploaded logo into optimized square PNG (Screenshot 2026-02-07 154246.png > taste-tales-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Derive a high-contrast favicon from the uploaded logo (Screenshot 2026-02-07 154246.png > taste-tales-favicon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Fix the site logo not appearing by ensuring the referenced logo asset exists in the frontend static assets and that all logo references point to the correct, existing filename/path (centralized in frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts).

Add resilient UI fallbacks for the logo elements so that if the logo asset fails to load, users still see a visible brand mark (e.g., a small text fallback or simple inline SVG) without layout breakage.

Ensure SEO and social meta image references in frontend/index.html use the same correct logo asset path as the rest of the app (via the canonical generated logo filename) so the siteâ€™s OG/Twitter images are not broken.

projectName: Fix missing logo rendering across the site
